00001 #include "serial.h"
00002 
00003 #define MAX_STRING 255 // stop if not a string
00004 void serial_print(char *str)
00005 {
00006 
00007         int i = 0;
00008         // Send until encountering string terminator
00009         // or exceeding MAX_STRING size in case str is not a string
00010         while( (str[i] != '\0') && ( i < MAX_STRING) )
00011         {
00012                 //loop_until_bit_is_set(UCSRA, UDRE); // wait for UDR to be clear 
00013                 //UDR = str[i++];    //send the character 
00014                 loop_until_bit_is_set(UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_A, UART_READY_TO_TRANSMIT); // wait for UDR to be clear 
00015                 UART_DATA_REG = str[i++];    //send the character 
00016 
00017 
00018                 //usart0_transmit_buffer_insert(str[i++]);
00019         }       
00020 }
